title: Šamaš Gate
description: The Šamaš Gate is one of Babylon's eight city gates and it is situated on the southwestern side of the inner city, directly south of the Tuba quarter. King Nebuchadnezzar II built the gate ca. 575 B.C.

properties.description: The proposed location of the Šamaš Gate is based on a plan of the ruins of eastern Babylon, with 200 m UTM coordinates.
properties.title: Proposed location of the Šamaš Gate
